description: Attributes and properties of table elements, such as align, vAlign, noWrap, bgcolor, or char set various visual presentation properties of the table and its sections and cells. These are obsolete, and some of them have no effect. Use CSS instead.
description_html: Attributes and properties of table elements, such as align, vAlign, noWrap, bgcolor, or char set various visual presentation properties of the table and its sections and cells. These are obsolete, and some of them have no effect. Use CSS instead.
name: Table styling

chrome.notes: Since Chrome 1, the attribute can be set, but has no effect.
